text.__SUMMARY__: Solanum fortunense is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae. It is found in Costa Rica and Panama.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Solanum fortunense". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T35466A9930210. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T35466A9930210.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
